name: Flying Pig - Tap to Fly
description:
Who said a pig cannot fly?!
Our Flying Pig will flap its wings to freedom like swing copters!
Tap to flap its wings and guide it through all the obstacles. Watch out for the pipes, they are as hard as iron!
A Flying Pig might not be as fit to fly as bird but it has a big heart and iron will.
Fly through the forest like a bird with this cute little piggy.
